events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-28, providing initial details and submitting the claim form.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured car in a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to initiate communication and manage the claim process effectively.
The claim was officially acknowledged, and confirmation was sent to the policyholder for reassurance of the process.
The agent requested additional documents including photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates.
The insured customer submitted the requested documents promptly, including detailed photos and the official police report.
The claims investigation team began examining all submitted evidence and verifying details related to the auto accident.
The investigation was completed successfully, confirming the facts as reported and identifying the extent of vehicle damage.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on repair costs and policy coverage limits.
The customer responded with positive feedback regarding the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the support.
Approval was granted for the claim settlement following acceptance of the offer by the policyholder.
The payment for the approved claim amount was issued and transferred to the customerâ€™s designated account.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and notifying the customer about the closure.
All records and documentation associated with the auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
